column1: What is Proxzar?
column2: Proxzar is an Artificial Intelligence powered platform where proxies of czars (subject matter experts) provide responses to queries from end users. Proxzar team has built Proxzar platform, where subject matter experts - supposedly with limited knowledge of AI, can create and host products (proxies). Proxzar team also provides professional services to large organizations in creating proxies for their own use. For e.g. to provide external customer service or internal employee self-service etc. Proxzar proxies can also be trained to facilitate new product development or help in driving innovations in an organization.For e.g., Proxies that are trained as a combination of bots and virtual assistants could be deployed to create a Voice of Customer (VoC) program that guides the innovation efforts.For a clear definition of new product development (NPD) or Innovation management or what is VoC, pl click here. Understanding that subject matter experts have decades of experience in their respective domains, Proxzar platform was built such that they do not need to have a good knowledge of AI. All they have to do is to bring their original content to our platform and annotate it. Proxzar's AI alogirithms will take care of building, training and deploying a proxy of the expert.Proxzar platform also provides several tools for a subject matter expert to do final verification of his/her proxy before deploying LIVE and also, monitoring the performance of the proxy in real-time. We provide 1 week training for SMEs on how to use Proxzar platform. Proxzar's unique value proposition is scalability and budget-friendly for large organizations. Proxies built on Proxzar platform can be scaled by training with new knowledge. For e.g., a large organization can train a proxy on HR policies/standards and deploy the proxy on their HRMS portal for Employee Self-Service. The same proxy could be scaled by training with new knowledge, which now includes Quality Management Standards (ISO-9001 etc..). Budget-friendly means affordable! Organizations do not have to make upfront investment to implement AI technology. Instead, they can start small with a pilot app and gradually scale across by adding new knowledge or features to the proxies. Proxzar proxies that are trained using the data and content specific to the domain or subject area can provide the above information that can be acted upon.Inventory intelligence implies inferences that can be drawn from inventory data that might be stored in a structured format, like ERP or DMS or CMS systems or Spreadsheets etc. The usecase Online Product Catalog Search can be extended to look up information from inventory data sources like ERP or CMS systems.
